question: How do I access the Pennie Broker re-certification training?
text:
How do I access the Pennie Broker re-certification training? 
          
        
Pennie has updated the Pennie Broker Training for Plan Year 2023. If you are currently a Pennie-Certified Broker, you will be required to complete a modified recertification course.
The training must be completed by Oct. 31, 2022
The training is hosted on 
Train PA.
You must log into your account and join the new training group to get access. The Recertification training group code for 2023 is 
pennierecert
.
How-To Update TrainPA Profile & Add Group Code
In the top right-hand corner of the TrainPA home page, click on the icon next to your name, then select 
Your Profile
.
Select 
Manage Groups
 on the left-hand sidebar.
Type in the group code 
pennierecert 
into the 
Join By Group Code
 box and hit 
Join
. You are now in the correct training group and can access the new Training
Once the page has updated, select Professional License Number on the left-hand bar. Click the blue bar to add a new License Number field.
Once, the new prompt appears, select License Type: None | Sub Type: None | License Number: Enter your Pennsylvania Insurance Dept. License Number. Then click the Green Check in the top right of the prompt.
